name: Policia Local
description: The town's local police force. Can also be called through 092.

name: Mossos d'Esquadra
description: A local branch of the Catalonian police force.

name: CAP Lloret
description: The town's central health center, suitable for minor/first-aid needs.

name: Hospital Comarcal de Blanes
description: The largest nearby hospital. It features a large number of specialists and modern equipment.
address: Carrer Accés Cala Sant Francesc, 5 (Located in the town of Blanes)

name: Ajuntament de Lloret
description: Lloret's Town Hall. A great resource for administrative matters.

name: Central Tourist Information Office
description: The town's main tourist information hub, helpful for newcomers to Lloret.

name: Terminal d'Autobusos
description: The main bus station. Offers travel services and information, including bus lines to the main cities of Barcelona and Girona.

name: Pharmacies
description: A catalogue featuring information about Lloret's Pharmacies, including a list of the 24-hour ones.
